[Who's Kslawdogg?]

"I'll show you a thing or two pip squeak," UM tells him, he hold out an open 
hand and then says, "pick two finger."

>From: gestalt_menasor@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

>
>Motormaster fumed, and his voice boomed, "I do not fear anyone, but
>Megatron" he then pointed accusignly, "and you are not Megatron" he
>spat through gritting teeth.
>
>Megatron chuckled. He had not intended for Ultra Megatron to not hear
>him. He turned his back on him, and finally picked out Shockwave.
>(Kslawdogg, exactly where is he, and what is he doing?)
